title: The Keeper
description: Rachel Jameson is focused on three things:Maintaining her soccer scholarship. Finishing her final year of college. And never looking back at the rough home life she came from.Then she meets Mack. He’s warm and handsome and his smile has her heart opening up in ways she never thought possible.But his messy past makes things complicated, especially when RJ finds out he’s the one man completely against the rules.Her new coach.The Keeper is a forbidden sports romance with angst, depth and emotional twists that will leave readers breathless.
author: Jillian Liota
